website_summaries.verdict: This affordable and stylish over door hook rack is the best space-saving solution available, as it includes 11 durable hooks to safely hang your items.
pros: Features 11 chrome hooks for maximum storage
Outfitted doors are able to easily shut
cons: While the ability to hang 11 items from one over door hook rack is convenient, the hooks have little space between them

website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy series of hooks make it easy to hang towels, robes, and clothing behind the door. Simple and compact style ideal for small bathrooms.
pros: Well-made to support more weight than the average towel rack
Stays secured with brackets and doesn’t require any assembly or installation since it fits over the door
Could easily be used in other rooms behind doors for clothing or accessories
cons: Some difficulty closing doors with brackets
Could wear down door frame from metal rubbing against the wood

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: I went out on a limb and ordered two, I have no storage space in my apartment, and they exceeded my expectations! I am using one in my bathroom and the other for dog harnesses and leashes by the front door. Both doors close easily and the hooks are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Hooks too close together & too small
customer_reviews.text: Hooks are too close together and don't protrude out enough to use easily. I have another over-the-door rack with hooks that's a much better design. The hooks stick out more and are more spaced apart. The design of my older rack works much better. I'm returning this and ordering another one that appears to have a better design.
customer_reviews.author: OC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Can Damage Your Door
customer_reviews.text: This hook is very durable and strong, it holds multiple jackets, necklaces, and other jewelry in our house without issue. However, the steel is so very durable that it’s actually quite difficult to install on the door. The part that you hang from the door is a bit too small for the width of our average-sized door, and doesn’t slide down all the way without damaging the wood and paint; it had to be jammed down and takes effort to pull back off again, and the door definitely cannot shut with this on. Otherwise, it hangs things nicely on our now always-open bedroom door. Does not require any assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: If the door won't close, pinch the top brackets a little so they are tight against the door.
customer_reviews.text: I put this on the inside of my closet door. At first, the door would not shut properly. But then noticed that the top piece was at an angle because my door was not quite as thick as the bracket was designed to fit. Easy fix was to pinch the door brackets tighter. Now the top of the brackets lay flat over the top of the door and no problem. Simple design and it looks okay, though I didn't buy it for its looks. Sturdy enough for normal use. Just use common sense and it should last quite a while. No fitting instructions or tips like I just gave you so I'm dinging it one star.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought one of these for the girlfriend because she always has purses and clothes lying around everywhere and it annoys me a little because I can be a little OCD when it comes to organization. Ended up liking it so much got one for myself as well. Great for so many things clothes, jackets especially, backpacks, purses, belts, dog leashes, and the list goes on and on.
customer_reviews.author: Yammo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hooks for your clothes
customer_reviews.text: These feel pretty sturdy, hangs my winter clothes with no issues. Has a strong grip on my door, and the over-the-door hook isn't very thick which means there's no problem with fitting between the door and the door frame. Why not 5-stars? Personally I feel that the quality is good rather than great, and could look a bit nicer as well. But it works, and works well.
customer_reviews.author: duepeace

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage
customer_reviews.text: These over-the-door hooks are great for storage. I purchased one for my closet for my belts. I liked it so much, I purchased a second one for my boyfriend's closet for his ties, caps, and belts. The over-the-door design does not interfere with the door opening or closing. The different sized hooks offer a variety of uses and there are plenty! I've already purchased 2 of these and would get more if I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: SadieTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but Check for Clearance or be Prepared to Sand
customer_reviews.text: The item is as described, but be prepared for a couple of things. One, the hanger portion is pretty thick. Check your door for clearance, or be prepared to file it down. Our door wouldn't close until I sanded down the top of the door a bit. Second, the "hooks" in the rear are pretty small and not very easy to access, even when nothing is hanging on the front hooks. You can wiggle and shove things back there, but it's a pretty compact space. In other words, don't plan to have 11 things hanging up all at once. Overall, it works well, and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Good not great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 some arrived misshapen, but I bent them back to normal with a little effort. These are great for getting clothes/jackets/towels off of the back of chairs and out of the way. Would recommend, but wish they had come with some kind of grip/anti-slip sleeve for the inside of the clamps that go over the door. they move around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: BENT AND RUINED
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars, I would. This thing came shipped all bent. It looks nothing like the picture. The big hook over the door is bent inwards and it’s not squared because it’s smushed. And the hook to hang thing is bent outwards. This is a horrible purchase and would NOT recommend it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great way for me to be able to hang up ...
customer_reviews.text: My new house has smaller closets than I'm used to, so I needed a way to expand my space without demo-ing some plaster and walls in a historic 90 year old house. This was a great way for me to be able to hang up my dress shirts without smashing them in between my other casual clothing. It's well made, classy looking, and sturdy. There's room for 11 garments, so that's a plus as well since most of these things have 4, maybe 5 hooks if you're lucky. I'd definitely buy this again, and in all likelihood, I'll probably have no choice in the matter soon anyway! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bircher

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. It doesn't fit as tight on my door which is fine, it's maybe about just a 1/4 of an inch space which is fine bc it doesn't move unless I'm pulling something off of it from the side. This goes well with the rest of my bathroom so I'm happy with my purchase. I had bought some a few years ago from Ross and it was terrible it would move all the time and I actually had to put some cushioning underneath bc it would knock on the door when you'd open and close so yeah that's the last time I buy over the door hanging racks from them.
customer_reviews.author: OuuuLaLaLa

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this door hanger after after my previously one bought from Bed Bath & Beyond broke. In fact the door "hooks" would bend very easily. I thought that is how they are supposed to be. But when one of the hooks broke, I started searching for a replacement and found this product. I was a bit skeptical, but I bought it anyway. When it arrived, it blew my mind. The "over the door hook-holders" are very sturdy. But the nice thing is that the kooks are very sturdy and well build with consistent chrome style mirror polish. The hanging hooks are rounded and don't poke into the clothes as my previous one did. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rajesh Jain

customer_reviews.title: Solid over the door rack
customer_reviews.text: The over the door rack is sturdy and good looking. I have it hanging over the front door to my apartment, and it holds a significant amount of coats, jackets, bags, etc. The different shaped hooks makes hanging things of different types easy.
customer_reviews.author: LLiz

customer_reviews.title: So much better than Command hooks!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! I don't know why it took so long for me to see this was WAY BETTER than Command hooks. For months, I've been trying to hang things on the back of my door with Command hooks but they would keep falling. Either I am dumb and don't know how to use Command hooks or the things I was trying to hang (purses and scarves) were just too heavy. But Whatever because I decided to get this and it's been the best purchase ever!! I am no longer worrying about closing my door softly so things don't fall. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent space-saver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a tiny bedroom and a typical teenage clothes addiction. There just wasn’t enough room for all her clothes, and it was stressing us out. I bought her this for the back of her bedroom door. It’s so great. Right out of the box it fit over the door. We can still close the door easily. Seems very sturdy. She hung her dresses on there in the picture, but she could easily hang up to three times that number of dresses. Saves so much space, and by hanging them the way she did, she can easily spot the one she wants. Highly recommend and I will be buying another for my room.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent overall over door hanging rack.
customer_reviews.text: I have previously ordered this particular over door hanging rack from this vendor and decided to purchase a second for my room based on my first positive experience. The rack itself is exactly as described in description and offers the most efficient and easy installation ever, as you only need to remove from package and simply attach the two hooks over the door you intend to mount; tool proof and foolproof obviously. As for quality the product speaks for itself and with that being said, I currently have it fully hooked with jeans and jackets and don't ever anticipate it coming close to bending/snapping unless for whatever reason I decide to perform pull-ups on them.
customer_reviews.author: QTrinh

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Item was bent when it arrived. It looked like it might have been good but why send this to someone? Terrible. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Hanger!
customer_reviews.text: I so appreciate the way they designed this door hanger with the various hooks. It fits well over my door and is suitable for hanging anything you might need to hang. I bought 2 of them and very happy I did. They are very sturdy, too. If they can hold my heavy handbag, then they can hold just about anything. Just great! Thank you for a really good door hanger.
customer_reviews.author: HighHopes

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended. Works without problems.
customer_reviews.text: I use this rack to hang my pants instead of throwing them about my room like a slob. The rack holds everything well -- jeans, sweat pants, shorts, etc. I have been using it for a few months without any problems. The little knobs at the higher tier of the rack are probably not as secure as the lower hooks, but I haven't had enough clothes to try them. All in all, I am quite pleased with this rack without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: Someguy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, appealing product design with superb service
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit for our door. I love this hanger because it fits perfectly and slid onto the door exactly perfect. The design is not bulky like other models and itself does not add space to the back of the door which was perfect for my smaller bathroom. The sender was so accommodating I received my first shipment and noticed a part was missing. I contacted the seller and they sent the second item for free within 12 hours from my first shipment. It was amazing l. The second item arrived just as I sent the first one back. Amazing. Super happy with the service and my prime. Thank you for the superb service.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Effective
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly! We live in a very small apartment so we need to utilize all the space. I have four of these and I hang two on the same door (on opposite sides) so both sides of the door are utilized. They are sturdy and I’ve hung a lot of stuff on them, no bending of the prongs occurred. Overall very happy with this product! The silver color is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great for Hanging Clothes
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to hang on the bathroom door, and it gave my hubby tons of hooks for his clothes. It would make a great gift, especially for those short on closet space, or for anyone who has a few favorite items they want readily available. It looks great too. And such a great price! I'm probably going to get one too, though I don't put as much stuff on hooks as he does.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Schwabach

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy over-the-door hanger that I've carried with me through college
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy over-the-door hanger that I've carried with me through college. I've only had one door that was too close to the frame and prevented the door from closing with this attached. Otherwise it's been able to hold tons of weight and is an awesome way to save space or use the most of your space. I would recommend putting something (tape, plastic, etc) between this and the door if you are renting/in a dorm because there is the possibility of this moving and scratching the door.
customer_reviews.author: JLS

customer_reviews.title: Good product but unfortunate luck of the draw
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar items in the past that don't seem to hold things well or don't feel very durable but these are great in that department. I ordered 3 of them, one was perfect, another was a little bent where it goes over the door (though it still works), and the other one is missing one of the little balls at the end of the hook. If all of them were like the first one then this would be a 5 star review. If I had gotten just one and it was one of the non perfect ones I definitely would not be as content.
customer_reviews.author: L C S O

customer_reviews.title: A handy little coat rack!
customer_reviews.text: A handy little coat rack! I don't have much floor or wall space so this over-the-door coat rack is perfect. I like it so much that I ended up with three of them. The price was right and they fit my doors (interior and exterior doors!) just fine! The construction is strong enough to hold a fair amount of winter gear, which is an important thing for me, living in the north country! I can recommend this rack without reservations!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben.G

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Packs a lot of capacity into a small space. You might think this is too narrow but with a jacket at the end the jacket flares almost to the edge of a standard door, so any wider and the end hooks become less usable. With so many hooks they are close together but manageable. I put a very small piece of adhesive felt furniture pad behind each end (bottom corners) so it doesn't mar or clang, which most any item like this will tend to do. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Me2

customer_reviews.title: It holds so much stuff!
customer_reviews.text: After my coat rack broke for the 2nd time, I purchased this over the door organizer to hold all of our coats. This hook is really pretty, hanging on the closet door outward onto my living room. It is extremely strong, I can't tell you how many coats and hoodies I have on it now. Plus it even holds my ridiculously heavy purse too at the same time. I highly recommend this Over the Door Organizer.
customer_reviews.author: SmelB45

customer_reviews.title: Towels slip off easily for some reason
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these, one for the bathroom for towels, the other for a bedroom closet for random things like bags, belts, etc. It works fine for the latter, but terribly for towels. Something about the geometry of the hooks and the smoothness causes them to slip off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & price, not ideal design.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this and another company’s product because I couldn’t decide which would be better for my needs. This is a very well made product, sturdy & priced right for which I would give 5 stars. The only down side is the design of the hooks. The hanging space is not maximized because the hooks are spaced too close together both vertically & horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: I really like this hanger
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hanger. It is so much better than the ones that stick way out and prevent the door from opening fully. However, my door is a little thinner than the hangers on the rack, and it makes so much noise when I close and open the door. That's rough when the baby's sleeping! I'm going to have to try to figure a way to keep it quiet. But it is great, and recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cpmo

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small apartment. I use this to hang frequently used items rather than using precious storage space. Because it hangs on a door, near a wall, when the door is opened, the items are out of sight and the room looks tidy. The rack is sturdy, compact, very useful, and even though I do not have it on display, it is quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: cost to return item  $5.99
customer_reviews.text: The fit of hanger over door is to big by 1/2" to 3/4", very sloppy. When you close the door, the door hook stick out that amount into the room. I need to re-bend with pliers to the correct size to fit my door. I want to send it back but I will be charge $5.99 UPS. this company is not a free return company....bad company policy :( ...... Will not purchase anything form this company again.
customer_reviews.author: kevin w.

customer_reviews.title: Really handy
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with these hooks. I wasn't sure what to expect. The upper hooks are perfect for belts and the bottom ones for everything else (I use them to hang pants on by their belt loops). The hook around the door could be more annoying if you open and close the door, but I don't, so I can't really say. But it's sturdy and does exactly what I need, better than expected, so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: snocyclist

customer_reviews.title: Strong and holds a lot of weight ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product, it's extremely sturdy and It's holding quite a lot of weight on it! I don't have enough closet space so I'm using it on my bathroom door which holds at least two weeks worth of my work clothes on it. It came quickly and I am very pleased to have purchased this. I may have to order another one because it is so handy(:
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price that I paid for this hook organizer, it's very sturdy and has a LOT more hooks than I know what to do with! I was impressed with the quality of the item and I have less than half the hooks filled with things so far. It's great for organizing in a small place and it fits over my standard door very well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Port

customer_reviews.title: My door was too thick
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect piece to use in the apartment I am renting, but had to return because my bathroom door was too thick to accommodate this. Instead, I got adhesive hooks that will hold towels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SicilianDiva

customer_reviews.title: No issues! Provides plenty of towel hooks.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for over the door towel hanging in our master bathroom. We had to bend the hooks a bit to adjust it to the door. But no issues with it! Works well! We bought this to replace a previous over the door towel hanger which was rusted! Will see how this one holds up
customer_reviews.author: Yanai

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put over the bedroom door to hang various items. We were surprised how sturdy it was, and there are plenty of places to hang things. The only problem is that the door does not completely close with the rack on it. Maybe, in time, it will tighten a bit. Time has passed and it is just what I'd hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a huge space saver since we have very little storage space. I live in a small studio with my boyfriend and we have 3 of these to hang anything like towels, caps, purses, jeans, and heavy jackets. It seems pretty sturdy and I have yet to see any of the bars bend. It does slide pretty easily on our doors when we grab something at an angle but that doesn't bother me much. I would just be careful with what I hang so as to not damage the shape of the item. For instance, I would avoid putting things that stretch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: This is not as great as I had imagined. It fits on my standard sized door ok. I put 5 hoodies on it (just 5!!) and the weight of just these cotton hoodies causes it to tilt on the door. I have to really try to close the door if it's on it with more than 4 hoodies.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang all my scarves and belts. Obviously don't need the high weight capacity for that but I feel that the rack is fairly heavy duty. The only thing is that one hooks was bent during shipping. I don't know if that speaks to what it can hold but it was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again, came broken and slanted and does not fit to the door. My door is a college apartment door pretty the same as any other I have had. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these two years ago and loved it. Last week, I ordered two more for my kid's bedrooms and the ones that came are not the same. The original one was all one piece, the new ones require you to connect the arms using tiny screw. Unfortunaly, on one side the screw holes are cut incorrectly and do not fit the screws and on the other side there are not nuts to hold the screws tight. It's crap, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Susan TeStroete

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hook rack
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great quality & strong. Not flimsy. Looks very nice. Would be great if they had it in white. Otherwise really nice. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: OC88

customer_reviews.title: Fast ship but a little wonky
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this because there is just never enough closet space. It was pretty crooked when it arrived; the hook tops were not square or fit for a door, but I was able to bend it to work. Kind of surprised how 'off' it was since it was packaged well. But now it's happily holding up 6 fairly heavy, fleece-lined hoodie sweatshirts, so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieM

customer_reviews.title: CHOOSE SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Fits over door well. HOWEVER, hardware was defective and incomplete. The hooks must be attached to the horizontal piece. Small screws enclosed; four for each side. Screw didn’t fit. Screws extremely short. No bolts enclosed. After trying for an hour - and going through my extensive hardware work room, I gave up and got out the duct tape. CHOOSE SOMETHING ELSE!
customer_reviews.author: JP; Texas

customer_reviews.title: Does what you need it to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the office so that I have a place to hang my coat and a spare suit if I have to head off to a formal meeting. I was still able to shut the door with this on there. It also seems to take the weight with no problem, so it seems fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Leeper

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt come assembled
customer_reviews.text: The rack is fine. It's not the most beautiful to look at but it holds plenty of items. I wish I had realized it wasnt ready to go right of the box. Putting it together is easy - you just need to affix the hanging hooks to the main body with 4 supplied screws - but if you dont have a screwdriver at the ready it may be an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Using to hang brooms, mops, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a townhome and I do not have enough room in my kitchen to store the broom, swifter mop, and other cleaning tools. This was perfect to hang over my utility closet and not these items are off the floor and out of the way in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Advisor12

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hook organizer!
customer_reviews.text: We had a different hook organizer over our door, but it broke. I looked for one that was a little sturdier and found this metal one. It's a significant improvement! You can't really use all of the hooks at the same time, as there's not enough room. But the plentitude of them gives a lot of versatility. And it's really sturdy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Psychic Cypher

customer_reviews.title: Durable product but noisy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this is gang bath towels on bathroom door. It holds towels well. The material is durable and firm. 4 stars because the hooks appear too large for the door and rock when door is closed and opened. The rack then hits the door over and over. I would recommend getting a cushion for the site of impact to reduce sound and wear on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Liz L.

customer_reviews.title: Good storage space but can’t close the door
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom to hang clothes after changing. It has a lot of storage space but is slightly thick so I can’t close the door. I am currently renting an apartment so don’t want to file down my door either. So for now I have left my door open and am using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hershey

customer_reviews.title: Basic and study, would fit most above-door clearance heights
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Seems sturdy and comes with a multitude of hooks. Also, it doesn't make an annoying jangle-jangle noise that happens every time you move the door with looser over the door hooks. Cons: The door I originally got it for won't close with it on, but it fits easily over my second choice door. Zero clearance is non-negotiable, even with these slim hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Goodjuju

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend. Very sturdy and holds more.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product to hang all of my coats (I have a lot of coats and jackets). I’m buying another one to hang all my purses and bags , because it’s very sturdy, reliable and great for normal and small spaces. It goes beyond storage capacity , because I have more than 11 coats hanging on this . Very good product ; I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sivonne L.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hooks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Fall/Winter/Spring. No one wants to put the coats in the closet because we're out so much. This over-the-door hook holds coats, scarves, hats... We can just put everything on the hooks and take down what we need quickly. No need to open the closet again until we store the coats for Summer. LOL
customer_reviews.author: K. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: one or two on every door
customer_reviews.text: I own several of these. They’re sturdy enough for winter coats and loaded school backpacks. Mostly used for damp items. None have bent, chipped, or rusted in a year of use. I rent so these were perfect as they don’t mar walls. One of the doors with the heaviest use does show a very slight indentation from the hanger but frankly it’s a cheap pressed wood door. The real wood door shows nothing.
customer_reviews.author: ihatelapels

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on door, and seems to hold items I need to hold well. I would like to see some thin padding or something under the hooks. It slides back and forth really easy on my doors. I am going to put something under there to hold them a little more. Still works well, but I am afraid I am going to pull it right off my door sometime.
customer_reviews.author: Da Beef

customer_reviews.title: You can close the door
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. I have bought 2 now. Perfect for belts, towels, pants etc. and takes up very little room hanging over the door. I can close my door as well. Just what I needed. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price! I purchased this item as a Pinterest inspired bra organizer and it was perfect! I love the smaller hooks in the back row...great use of space. Also, I was pleased to see that this hanger still allowed for my closet door to close comfortably, which is always a concern with products such as this. Will be purchasing for other DIY organizers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the sturdiness of this item. I needed some extra hanging space and this was very suitable. I used the cascading hangers and I was able to fit a lot of clothes on this hanger. A very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and can hold very heavy stuff
customer_reviews.text: The steel used to make this door hooker is very hard and high quality,you can hang over 10 pounds bag on it without any problem,I bought two at once,I wish I can buy more for every door of my house,its very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: gcp60741

customer_reviews.title: hang a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I needed 2 racks -- one for the bathroom to hang bath towels and bathing suits. All four suits and all the wet towels can hang. I used the other on back of bedroom door to hang 3 3 pc outfits -- jacket, vest and pants in black, blue and gray -- so easy to make a quick outfit now.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Horton

customer_reviews.title: Love this one!
customer_reviews.text: Have had a few over the years, but this one is great. Hangs over walk in closet door for pocketbooks, bathrobes, etc. I would recommend this to anyone. My closet door measures 1.5 inches thick and this fits perfectly. Once the weight of items is on, it doesn't move or bounce.
customer_reviews.author: asmjjc3

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for having a place for guests to store their jackets, purses, and umbrellas. It is sturdy and worth the price! UPDATE: I love this so much (holds a bunch of empty purses as well as coats and has lasted over a year) that I have purchased three so far! The over-the-door hooks are slim enough to fit on most doors, and so they fit on both my bedroom and entryway closet doors. They're perfect for organizing scarves and other items, too. If you have brushed or chrome accents, they make for a complementary look.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoGal

customer_reviews.title: Great material, hoops are not that big but they work
customer_reviews.text: I love that it fits in my door which doesn't have much room for anything in the middle of the door and the frame. The only thing that could be better is the hoops, they could be bigger but for me, it works.
customer_reviews.author: Clau X

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Dorm Room
customer_reviews.text: It was suggested by several parents of college-bound students that over-the-door clothing hooks really come in handy. Since in another month my son will be leaving for college, I am sure that he will inform me about the usefulness of the door hook assembly.
customer_reviews.author: TradMan

customer_reviews.title: Can't close doors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my classroom for students to hang their coats behind the door as a space saver. I like that there are so many hooks. Unfortunately, the part that hooks over the door is too thick or something because the door couldn't close with the rack on it. I brought it home, hoping I could use it here, but same problem. I cannot use it on any door I wish to be able to close. I'm not willing to file down a door just to use this rack. The return window closed unfortunately, so this thing will just end up at Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Funyun

customer_reviews.title: Nice door hanger, wish it came in bronze color
customer_reviews.text: This is a great door hanger, fits comfortably over the door, and looks of hooks. I wish it came in a bronze color as it doesn't match my door hardware. I keep it on the inside of the door, so you can't see it. Please make a bronze one!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great for thicker doors but might not bear a lot of weight
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this hook and the fact that it fits well over my thicker wooden doors. Because of the flexibility to fit thicker doors, however, it might mean that the over the door part will not withstand hanging a lot of heavy, winter items on it.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Clever Over The Door Coathooks
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to hang my coat, but I didn't want to put a coat hook on my wall. This little unit works great in my office. I just hung it over the door and Viola! Instant coat hooks with no effort!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, unobtrusive looking
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, unobtrusive looking. Minus one star for making the door difficult to close on some doors (closes ok on others) and it bangs against the door just a little if it's not weighted down with stuff hanging on it. I would t recommend on doors with a tight seal that you need to close all the way, but fine if that isn't a concern. I'm not a fan of drills and screws and mounting stuff permanently so this is a good solution for me on a bathroom door in a bathroom without enough towel racks (and no good place to put another) and I love having a couple in the utility room.
customer_reviews.author: blahblah

customer_reviews.title: I'm Hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had an over the door towel rack that was just awful The towels would constantly fall down and it became such a nuisance that I had to replace with something that actually kept the items on the hook. Although this item arrived a bit dented, (Amazon gave me a small credit for this) it is exactly what I was looking for and it does the job. No more towels falling on the floor, and a great way to save space in my tiny bathroom. I would recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: IT holds long and heavy clothes
customer_reviews.text: I used this rack for my over the door need. It is very study and fulfilled my need perfect to hang long items on. It furnished the need I was looking for. It also holds heavy objects. very nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lively

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy racks for coats no sweaters!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great over the door hook for belts, coats and scarves. The only reason I am only giving 3 stars is because the hooks are small and it causes the neck of my sweaters to have an indent. I didnt realize it and the hook went right through one of stitches. I would say dont use it for sweaters unless there is a loop sewn in the the garment.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the best over the door hanger I've ever bought. It holds the most items. It doesn't make the door hard to open and close. Im using it for all my sons dress up costumes.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth matheson

customer_reviews.title: Good for hanging shirts
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hang up some of my shirts, and for that purpose it works really well. Since I use coat hangers, all of the hooks on the rack are usable/accessible. However, for other uses like towels or hats they are likely too close together to use all of them so it is more like a 6 hook rack (which still isn't bad). My door is 1 1/2" and the rack fits it nicely even though it has room to accommodate a bigger door. It makes my door slightly harder to close but its barely noticeable. The chrome finish looks good. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael

customer_reviews.title: Lots of hooks
customer_reviews.text: Love the chrome color. This is very sturdy to hold my light jacket, shirts and other items. There is more hooks than regular 4 hook racks. It hangs over the door with no problems. I can easily move it to another door if I like. No holes in walls.
customer_reviews.author: pam foster

customer_reviews.title: Screws don’t attach to the rack
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item. The screw holes that attach the hanging arms to the rack we’re too big and the screws would not “bite” to attach. If it came with securing nuts on the back it might have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a useful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with keeping my scarves and tote bags organized, but with this organizer rack I've been able to keep track of everything. I'm impressed by how much weight it can hold - I'll hang my purse and a full tote bag on it every night and it's never bent or fallen. It's also ideal for knit scarves. I've had other scarf racks, but they always catch the yarn and pull the weave apart. With this organizer, there are no rough bits to catch on and the hooks are large enough that they don't poke through the weave. Definitely a useful purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Rack is able to clear objects while still being reachable
customer_reviews.text: The clothes rack's dimensions work out great to hang on my door. The very bottom of the long hooks hang down 11.25" inches from the top of the door. Because all the hooks are somewhat low, they'll be reachable even for people who are shorter than 5 feet tall. But they're still high enough up to reach to clear the refrigerator that my door opens up against. Though the brackets are wider than the width of the door, the rack is nonetheless pretty flush to the door when hung.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of hooks and fits the door
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I have different hook rack in my other bathroom that is a little slimmer so if you have a very tight fit above your door then there are probably better options, but for my second bathroom this fit fine. Seems to be built pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: It's useless
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are separate from the hanger. There is no thread in the hanger to tighten the screws. The hanger will fall down. Returned it. I'll not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Works Like I need it!
customer_reviews.text: We all know that a balled-up wet towel will produce an order. My wife has a bad habit of hanging things on the doorknob of our bathroom, it drives me crazy. So I need a quick solution, and Amazon didn't fail. This was the first rack that popped up from my search, and with the outstanding reviews, I decided to give it s shot. IT didn't fail. I served it purpose. Now both my wife and I can hang our towels to present that wet nasty smell.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fuqua

customer_reviews.title: Great Over the Door Storage
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and want get my deposit back when I move out; meaning I put as few holes as I can into the walls. This over the door storage rack is perfect for my bathroom and I may even buy another for my to hang coats.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Giedekier

customer_reviews.title: Broken Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: The product came already bent new in the box. I have seen other reviews and hoped this was an outlier but seems to be a consistent problem. They rack seems too light weight and does not have any mechanism to protect the door from getting scratched. Overall a big disappointment with poor build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Nice place to hang your hat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son who had just moved to a new apartment that was short of closet space. This worked perfectly for him, over the door and a place to hang jackets and hats.. He likes it very much. I will probably purchase one for me too! Sorry I can't give specifics since it was a gift and I don't actually have one myself. I only know that he liked it a lot and it helped solve a issue for him. I think on the back of a bathroom door would be a good place for it too.
customer_reviews.author: stilljojo

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: Works well for me and like the length, makes it easier to access frequently used things like purses. Did not fit on original door i wanted it on, but was ok on another door thats kept open so I'm good with that. Not products fault, is the cut of door/frame. All in all, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: The most untidy person will use this
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 19 year old grandson who does not like to clean his room. It's much easier to put them hooded sweatshirts by bookbag or sweatshirt. Coat jackets shirts gym bag ect...
customer_reviews.author: WVa Penny

customer_reviews.title: Measure door thickness and test with 7 pieces of paper to make sure it closes
customer_reviews.text: Recently repainted our bathroom doors but that shouldn’t have an affect. I bought 2 of them. 1 didn’t fit over one of our doors and couldn’t close, and the other fit over the door but I had to forcibly push the door and it scratched our door trim. Returned both
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: This over the door hook really holds up in weight and it's the perfect fit for my door. I was apprehensive about it having to hold several jackets and winter coats but it's actually doing it. Hanging things now is so simple, with the deep hook. Nothing falls out and it hang my all of them in place. Not to mention 3 hats are also hanging neatly. The delivery took 1 day, instead of 2 and I was so glad it did. It was fully assembled, and all I did was hang it over the door and put it to work. Definitely worth the money, when you need extra room to hang jackets and coats.
customer_reviews.author: Erik2024

customer_reviews.title: Just ok to handing some small things with hooks.
customer_reviews.text: The two shelves were crooked when I received them. It's easy to fall when hanging the towels. But it is ok to handing some small things with hooks I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not for hanging towels
customer_reviews.text: Bad product design. It has these rounded edges so towels won’t stay put in there. If you want this for hanging purses or something with straps it’s great but towels will absolutely slip right off.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Arrived bent
customer_reviews.text: It arrived bent out of shape. I had to bend it back and hope it didn't break. Even after I tried to fix it, the hook have a weird upturned piece that prevented the door I put it on from closing. It also scraped the trim on the door frame. I should return the stupid thing... it was $15!
customer_reviews.author: NaNaRhae

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: It's nothing fancy, but it does it's job. Surprisingly sturdy with ample storage. I have a leather jacket, a denim jacket, a bomber jacket, several hoodies and a backpack along with several belts hanging from mine and it doesn't seem to be bending or warping. The clearance is great; I can open and close my door just as I did before "installing" the rack. Would definitely buy again. Simple and inexpensive solution to a storage problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shane A. Brakstad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit, great product
customer_reviews.text: I measured twice and ordered once and have found a coat rack to hang on the door. I ordered from amazon for free returns, fearing that even if I ordered the right width of the bars, that the metal would be too thick for the door to open and close. I had no trouble getting it hung and closing the door. This is the first one I've found I could hang and shut the door, tightly. It has lots of hooks for coats, jackets, sweaters, and random odds and ends. Seems durable and will certainly put an end to the days of "coats laying around" because I don't have a convenient place to hang them. Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: justBRandom04

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed for a Small Space
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it--size, sturdiness, qualify and number of hooks. Holds a minimum of 11 items, just what I need for a possible week visit.
customer_reviews.author: Doris V. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Serves my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Needed one of the racks but discovered most of them don't hang down far enough for those of us that are a bit vertically challenged. This one, I could reach! Nice and sturdy, lots of hooks and I can still shut the closet door. Serves my needs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and very practicle
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I didn't have to nail anything into the door so it is portable and its also sturdy at the same time! I really like how I can hang so many stuff on it and it saves it of closet space .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying a second one. Super sturdy with enough hooks to hang everything. I put so much heavy stuff on this hanger I can't believe how well it's held up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fletcher

product_meta.title: DecoBros Supreme Over The Door 11 Hook Organizer Rack, Chrome Finish
product_meta.description:
DecoBros Supreme Over The Door 11 Hook Organizer Rack, Chrome Finish 
US Design Patent #: USD699467
feature_bullets: The Over the Door Hook Rack is perfect for anyone who needs more hanging space
Features a flexible bracket that fits doors up to 1-3/4 inch thick.
Beautiful Supreme Quality Chrome Finish with 11 Hooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,750 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
